alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 7:21PM MDT until April 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 9 PM this evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, and 224 through 237 which includes the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo an Wet Mountains, Fremont and Teller Counties, and all of the eastern plains... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from noon to 8 PM Wednesday afternoon and evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221...222...and 224 through 229... which includes the San Luis valley, the Sangre De Cristos and Wet Mountains, Fremont, Teller, El Paso, Pueblo and Huerfano counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Wednesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 226. * Winds...Rest of this evening...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. For tomorrow...south 5 to 15 mph with gusts to 25 to 30 mph. * Timing...This evening until 9 PM. For Wednesday, noon until 8 PM. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest
